DataElement.preferredName: Clonality Plasma Cell Bone Marrow Test Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to the test for bone marrow plasma cell clonality.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clonality Plasma Cell Bone Marrow Test
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the test for bone marrow plasma cell clonality.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Related by decent from a single progenitor cell.:Specialized forms of antibody-producing B-LYMPHOCYTES. They synthesize and secrete immunoglobulin. They are found only in lymphoid organs and at sites of immune responses and normally do not circulate in the blood or lymph. (Rosen et al., Dictionary of Immunology, 1989, p169 & Abbas et al., Cellular and Molecular Immunology, 2d ed, p20)

Concepts.definition: Related by descent from a single progenitor cell.
A fully mature B-Cell that produces a specific antibody.

Property.preferredDefinition: The soft tissue filling the cavities of bones. Bone marrow exists in two types, yellow and red. Yellow marrow is found in the large cavities of large bones and consists mostly of fat cells and a few primitive blood cells. Red marrow is a hematopoietic tissue and is the site of production of erythrocytes and granular leukocytes. Bone marrow is made up of a framework of connective tissue containing branching fibers with the frame being filled with marrow cells (MSH98):A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
